channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: ‘Life-threatening cold’ expected as polar vortex stretches across U.S. after deadly weekend flooding
item.description: Harsh weather moved west as a polar vortex was expected to grip the Rockies and the northern Plains after winter storms pummeled the eastern U.S. over the weekend, killing at least 10 people, including nine victims in Kentucky who died during flooding from heavy rains.

item.title: Some in Hurricane Helene-ravaged North Carolina embrace Trump’s push to abolish FEMA
Dismantling of federal efforts to monitor election interference creates opening for foreign meddling
